Description: Small brass bowl with round bottom. Cast with some hammering and finished on a lathe. Decorated with lotus flowers and inlaid with gold, silver and black organic material.
Bibliographic references: Auld 2004 / Renaissance Venice, Islam and Mahmud the Kurd - a metalworking enigma (pp.176-177)
La Niece, Ward et al 1995 / Veneto-Saracenic metalwork: an analysis of the bowls and incense burners in the British Museum (Table 4)
